title: Border, 1800–25
description:
Wide central band of intertwined acanthus leaves, forming a guilloche-like design. Above this is ros of beading and tongue and leaf molding. Row of dentil motif along top edge with narrow band of cable molding or rope twist along lower edge. Printed in shades of yellow, ocher and gray on black ground.

H#556 ?

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1800–25.
1800–25. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-49-a/e.
